level.heading: Section references
level.text: This section is referenced in § 8-1020, § 8-1021, and § 8-1022.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 8-208
level.text: Law 8-208, the “Paper and Paper Products Recycling Incentive Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-418, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 20, 1990, and December 4, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 14, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-283 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 9-130
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-130, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1022.01.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 10-68
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-68, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1003.

level.heading: Editor's notes
level.text: For present law, see Chapters 10B and 10C of this title.
